\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 45823}

\subsection*{A Romantic Dream}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Bliss Out}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 5 joints/cigs & smoked & Damiana & ground / crushed\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 2 tsp & oral & Damiana & tea\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I examined the packets of various bags of herbs and decided to buy a packet of `Bliss Out' (aka dried and chopped Damiana) and some rolling papers. I rolled a joint Damiana and a little  while waiting for the train.



It tasted slightly unpleasant, it's something that grows on me. Over the course of getting back to where I was staying by train I smoked two more joints. I decided that I had wasted 15 bucks and that it did squat. I made two cups of tea (seeped two teaspoons in boiling water for a few minutes water, strain, add honey) and smoked two more joints, watched a movie and went to bed.



Well.



I had the best night. I didn't get up till two the next day, it was like having erotic dreams on tap. I didn't notice any high and if there is one its very mild.

\end{document}
